001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.MetaschemaDataTypeProvider;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.InvalidValueForCastFunctionException;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.impl.TimeWithTimeZoneItemImpl;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.IAtomicOrUnionType;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.type.InvalidTypeMetapathException;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
014
015import java.time.OffsetTime;
016import java.time.ZonedDateTime;
017
018import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
019
020/**
021 * An atomic Metapath item representing a time value in the Metapath system with
022 * an explicit time zone.
023 * <p>
024 * This interface provides functionality for handling time values with time zone
025 * information, supporting parsing, casting, and comparison operations. It works
026 * in conjunction with {@link ZonedDateTime} to eliminate time zone ambiguity.
027 */
028public interface ITimeWithTimeZoneItem extends ITimeItem {
029  /**
030   * Get the type information for this item.
031   *
032   * @return the type information
033   */
034  @NonNull
035  static IAtomicOrUnionType<ITimeWithTimeZoneItem> type() {
036    return MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.TIME_WITH_TZ.getItemType();
037  }
038
039  @Override
040  default IAtomicOrUnionType<ITimeWithTimeZoneItem> getType() {
041    return type();
042  }
043
044  /**
045   * Construct a new time item using the provided string {@code value}.
046   *
047   * @param value
048   *          a string representing a time
049   * @return the new item
050   */
051  @NonNull
052  static ITimeWithTimeZoneItem valueOf(@NonNull String value) {
053    try {
054      return valueOf(MetaschemaDataTypeProvider.TIME_WITH_TZ.parse(value));
055    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
056      throw new InvalidTypeMetapathException(
057          null,
058          String.format("Invalid time value '%s'. %s",
059              value,
060              ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
061          ex);
062    }
063  }
064
065  /**
066   * Construct a new time item using the provided {@code value}.
067   * <p>
068   * This method handles dates with explicit timezone information using
069   * ZonedDateTime. The timezone is preserved as specified in the input and is
070   * significant for time operations and comparisons.
071   *
072   * @param value
073   *          a time, with time zone information
074   * @return the new item
075   */
076  @NonNull
077  static ITimeWithTimeZoneItem valueOf(@NonNull ZonedDateTime value) {
078    return new TimeWithTimeZoneItemImpl(ObjectUtils.notNull(value.toOffsetDateTime().toOffsetTime()));
079  }
080
081  /**
082   * Construct a new time item using the provided {@code value}.
083   * <p>
084   * This method handles dates with explicit timezone information using
085   * ZonedDateTime. The timezone is preserved as specified in the input and is
086   * significant for time operations and comparisons.
087   *
088   * @param value
089   *          a time, with time zone information
090   * @return the new item
091   */
092  @NonNull
093  static ITimeWithTimeZoneItem valueOf(@NonNull OffsetTime value) {
094    return new TimeWithTimeZoneItemImpl(value);
095  }
096
097  /**
098   * Cast the provided type to this item type.
099   *
100   * @param item
101   *          the item to cast
102   * @return the original item if it is already this type, otherwise a new item
103   *         cast to this type
104   * @throws InvalidValueForCastFunctionException
105   *           if the provided {@code item} cannot be cast to this type
106   */
107  @NonNull
108  static ITimeWithTimeZoneItem cast(@NonNull IAnyAtomicItem item) {
109    ITimeWithTimeZoneItem retval;
110    if (item instanceof ITimeWithTimeZoneItem) {
111      retval = (ITimeWithTimeZoneItem) item;
112    } else if (item instanceof ITemporalItem) {
113      retval = fromTemporal((ITemporalItem) item);
114    } else if (item instanceof IStringItem || item instanceof IUntypedAtomicItem) {
115      try {
116        retval = valueOf(item.asString());
117      } catch (IllegalStateException | InvalidTypeMetapathException ex) {
118        // asString can throw IllegalStateException exception
119        throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(ex);
120      }
121    } else {
122      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(
123          String.format("unsupported item type '%s'", item.getClass().getName()));
124    }
125    return retval;
126  }
127
128  @NonNull
129  private static ITimeWithTimeZoneItem fromTemporal(@NonNull ITemporalItem temporal) {
130    if (!temporal.hasTimezone()) {
131      // asString can throw IllegalStateException exception
132      throw new InvalidValueForCastFunctionException(
133          String.format("Unable to cast the temporal value '%s', since it lacks timezone information.",
134              temporal.asString()));
135    }
136    // get the time
137    return valueOf(ObjectUtils.notNull(temporal.asZonedDateTime().toOffsetDateTime().toOffsetTime()));
138  }
139
140  @Override
141  default ITimeWithTimeZoneItem castAsType(IAnyAtomicItem item) {
142    return cast(item);
143  }
144}
